com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dao

Class DbAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dao.DbAccess
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbAccessWithUser

    public abstract class DbAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides all the services needed to connect and disconnect the server from a generic DBMS.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.sql.Connection conn
      Connection with the DBMS
      protected static java.lang.String currentPass
      Password associated to the user currently in use
      protected static java.lang.String currentUser
      Name of the user currently in use
      (package private) static java.lang.String DATABASE
      Name of the database to which the connection will be established
      (package private) static java.lang.String PASSWORD
      Password of the account chosen for connection
      (package private) static java.lang.String SERVER
      Server to which the connection will be established
      (package private) static java.lang.String USER_ID
      Username of the account chosen for connection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection with the DBMS.
      protected abstract void createDatabase(java.sql.Statement s)
      Creates the database with the information in the class' fields.
      protected abstract boolean existDatabase()
      Checks if the database already exists.
      static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Returns an object that represents the connection with the DBMS.
      protected abstract java.lang.String getDBMSDriverClass()
      Returns the name of the driver necessary to connect with the DBMS.
      protected abstract java.lang.String getMainConnectionString()
      Returns the URL connection needed to connect to the DBMS as the username specified in the class fields.
      protected abstract java.lang.String getRootConnectionString()
      Returns the URL connection needed to connect with administrator privileges to the DBMS, in order to check the existence of user and database root specified in the class fields.
      void initConnection(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
      Initialize the connection with the DBMS, logging as an user.
      (package private) void initDatabase()
      Loads the driver of the DBMS and initializes the database, creating it if it does not exists.

      • closeConnection

        public static void closeConnection()
        Closes the connection with the DBMS.

      • createDatabase

        protected abstract void createDatabase(java.sql.Statement s)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates the database with the information in the class' fields.
        Parameters:
        s - Statement by which the query are executed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the creation fails

      • existDatabase

        protected abstract boolean existDatabase()
        Checks if the database already exists.
        Returns:
        true if the database exists, false otherwise

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Returns an object that represents the connection with the DBMS.
        Returns:
        the object

      • getDBMSDriverClass

        protected abstract java.lang.String getDBMSDriverClass()
        Returns the name of the driver necessary to connect with the DBMS.
        Returns:
        the name of the driver

      • getMainConnectionString

        protected abstract java.lang.String getMainConnectionString()
        Returns the URL connection needed to connect to the DBMS as the username specified in the class fields.
        Returns:
        the URL connection

      • getRootConnectionString

        protected abstract java.lang.String getRootConnectionString()
        Returns the URL connection needed to connect with administrator privileges to the DBMS, in order to check the existence of user and database root specified in the class fields.
        Returns:
        the URL connection

      • initConnection

        public final void initConnection(java.lang.String user,
                  java.lang.String pass)
                          throws DataException,
                                 IncorrectLoginException
        Initialize the connection with the DBMS, logging as an user.
        Parameters:
        user - Name of the user
        pass - Password of the user
        Throws:
        DataException - if some errors occur
        IncorrectLoginException - if login fails

      • initDatabase

        void initDatabase()
            throws DataException,
                   IncorrectLoginException
        Loads the driver of the DBMS and initializes the database, creating it if it does not exists.
        Throws:
        DataException - if database can not be correctly created
        IncorrectLoginException - if login to the DBMS fails
